channel.title: Fail life
channel.description:
Ok, earlier today a friend was chasing me at school because I was swearing at him at school. While being chased, I fell (fail) and my knee bone is out of place... so.. that's one great thing in my life atm.
2nd, my next door neighbor's best mates Mum died today, her son is in a coma right now, the worst part is he doesn't know his mum is dead... because he is in a coma.
3rd, I saw him around 9PM kind of crying over his mate, and his mates mum, which is rare from him, he's like 21.. and drinking a lot of alcohol... I was wondering why he was crying, he said "I'll tell you. Here, take some alchohol... so I did, and i've never drank, so... yea, 2 bottles is whiskey I drank, 45% alchohol. After that I knew I was drunk, I was spinning outt bad. So.. I went home, tried to go on comp, but couldn't see the keys properly (being drunk and all), so I wnt to sleep.. It's been like 8 hours since I drank, and No sleep because of the pain in my knee + vomitting badd from the alchhol. So, I'm on comp now.. fearing the next time i throw up. So basically, just don't drink shit you can't handle, I spose...

item.title: Fail life
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:12, topic:342452”]Lightweight.
I’ve been drunk so much that I’ve fallen down stairs, puked up and pretended to be superman off the living room sofa, but not so much that I couldn’t see the keyboard keys. :|[/quote]hah, I was literally typing like this to my friends:
hwy wyts yp >>>> “Hi what’s up???”

Read full topic

item.title: Fail life
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Sorry to hear about your knee and the mother/son.

As for the drinking, you enjoy what you enjoy I guess.

TabbyKiller:

enough with this alcohol shit. Make way for chocolate milk.

I personally agree. I can enjoy a glass of pepsi or something more than a can of Busch N/A or something. Pretty much the only beer I will drink is Busch N/A.

Read full topic
